author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Department of Tamil Development, Government of Tamil Nadu, conducts district level essay, oratory and poetry competitions for higher secondary and college students on 27 and 28 of this month here.

For college students the competitions are to be held in Government Arts College, Tiruvannamalai starting from 10 a.m. on January 27.

For Higher secondary (class XI and XII) students the competitions are to be held in Thiyagi Annamalai Government Higher Secondary School from 10 a.m. on January 28.

Every institution could send only one student for every segment, viz. essay, oratory and poetry.

A single student may represent the institution in all the three events. Two best students would be selected in each segment. In both college and higher secondary categories winners would get Rs.10,000 cash award and runners up would get Rs.7,000. Winners in each segment in both categories would be sent to participate in the State-level competition. A release from District Collector A. Gnanasekaran said.
title: District level competitions for students in Tamil
